name: dora-ros1-to-ros2-image-bridge
description: ROS1 to ROS2 Bridge Example for Dora Dataflow with Image and TTS Support

scripts.build:ros1: docker build -f Dockerfile.ros1 -t dora-ros1-builder . && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/workspace dora-ros1-builder
scripts.build:ros2: cargo build -p ros2-image-sink && cargo build -p ros2-tts-source
scripts.build:ros2:docker: docker build -f Dockerfile.ros2 -t dora-ros2-builder . && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/workspace dora-ros2-builder
scripts.build: npm run build:ros1 && npm run build:ros2
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:ros1 && npm run build:ros2:docker
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build && npm run start:dev
scripts.build:audio: cargo build -p gstreamer-audio-receiver && cargo build -p ros2-audio-publisher && cargo build -p dora-audio-sink

author: Dora Team
